getCrossPointAfter

public int getCrossPointAfter(int x,
                              int y)
Method determines whether point[x,y] crosses with this line with some tolerance (5) d(X, p) = abs(a*x0 + b*y0 + c)/sqrt(a^2 + b^2) and if yes, return index of a point of a cross point.

Returns:
If line doesn't contain any point but point[x,y] is crossing the line; or if point[x,y] is crossing near the beginning of the line, then 0 is returned. It means that new point should be added before first point. And if point[x,y] doesn't cross the line, -1 is returned. Otherwise is returned index of point that crosses the line.
